# Light Sleeper
## Overview
Light Sleeper (Ex): You never incur a penalty on [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] skill checks due to resting or sleeping. In addition, you can be awakened from magical sleep as a move action. 

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 68
